categoryName: Gift Ideas for National Wear Red Day
categoryBlurb: Did you know that 1 in 3 women die of heart disease and stroke each year? Honor the women in your life by celebrating National Wear Red Day with a gift from the group in glorious red. While the official day is celebrated on February 6th, we think you can show your support for women’s heart health by wearing red any day of the year - so we’ve curated our favorite things in red. Show your mother, wife, sister, aunt or cousin how much you care with a gift in red from family and friends.

productList.productName: Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphones in Red
productList.productDescription: Make a statement with Beats by Dr. Dre Studio headphones in brilliant red. Pair and play with your Bluetooth® device – up to a 30 foot range. Experience dual-mode adaptive noise canceling and the iconic Beats sound. Includes a 12-hour rechargeable battery with Fuel Gauge and takes hands-free calls with a built-in microphone.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Beats by Dr. Dre Studio Wireless Over-Ear Headphones in Red

productList.productName: butter LONDON “Let Them Wear Red” - GiftStarter Exclusive Set
productList.productNameShort: Let Them Wear Red GS Exclusive
productList.productDescription:
There’s no better way to show your support for women’s heart health than with this GiftStarter exclusive set from butter LONDON. All your favorite products with shades of red for every occasion. Set includes:

Ladybird Liquid Lipstick - This opaque, tomato red liquid lipstick is ruling the catwalk! Grab our exclusive Fashion Week shade and rock it in red.
Come to Bed Red Moisture Matte Lipstick - Full coverage, classic red cream
Secret Door Lip Gloss - Sheer, poppy red gloss.
Saucy Jack Nail Lacquer - A dark, blood red creme. In the immortal words of Derek Smalls, “You're a naughty one, Saucy Jack!“
Chancer Nail Lacquer - Wear this deep, “crushed glitter“ red nail lacquer when you are feeling particularly out of his league. He doesn't deserve you anyway.
Old Blighty Nail Lacquer - A solid, brick red nail lacquer that lies between red and brown. Sexy, yet sensible; just like you.
La Moss Nail Lacquer - A vampy deep, dark red nail lacquer full of red wine, just like its inspiration.
Nail 999 Rescue System - Named for the British equivalent of “911“ in the States, the Nail 999™ Rescue System instantly brightens the appearance of your nails.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter butter LONDON “Let Them Wear Red” - GiftStarter Exclusive Set

productList.productName: Burberry Gabardine Trench Coat with Check Cashmere Undercollar in Military Red
productList.productDescription: A Burberry classic that will last a lifetime. Cotton gabardine trench coat with a distinctive check undercollar in wool cashmere. Invented by Thomas Burberry in 1879, cotton gabardine is a tightly woven, weatherproof fabric that protects against the elements. A Sandringham slim fit, the trench coat is tailored closely to the body with a fitted waist and narrow set-in sleeves. Heritage details include a storm shield, gun flap and epaulettes.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Burberry Gabardine Trench Coat with Check Cashmere Undercollar in Military Red

productList.productName: Michael Kors Selma Medium Studded Saffiano Leather Messenger in Red
productList.productDescription: Studs are in! Striking the perfect balance between edge and elegance, the studded Selma is a great go-to tote for everyday ease. The streamlined, Saffiano leather shape and metallic accents make it the perfect piece for transitioning from uptown days to downtown nights.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Michael Kors Selma Medium Studded Saffiano Leather Messenger in Red

productList.productName: Women's Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit in Bright Crimson
productList.productDescription: Represent in red every day with new Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit running shoes – a pair for each of you. Feel that close-to-the-ground connection you crave in this lower heel-lift shoe that's lightweight, flexible and features an Anatomically Rounded Heel. Experience the uniquely natural, multi-directional freedom provided by the revolutionary Hexagonal Flex Grooves working in harmony with the midsole to provide you with flexibility right where you want it most. Plus, your feet will be cradled in breathable, secure support, mile after mile in these Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit shoes thanks to the wrap-around Flywire technology and breathable Flyknit material. Women’s are 5.6 ounces. Men’s are 7.1 ounces.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Women's Nike Free 3.0 Flyknit in Bright Crimson

productList.productName: Men's Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit in Black/Red
productList.productDescription: Represent in red every day with new Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit running shoes – a pair for each of you. Feel that close-to-the-ground connection you crave in this lower heel-lift shoe that's lightweight, flexible and features an Anatomically Rounded Heel. Experience the uniquely natural, multi-directional freedom provided by the revolutionary Hexagonal Flex Grooves working in harmony with the midsole to provide you with flexibility right where you want it most. Plus, your feet will be cradled in breathable, secure support, mile after mile in these Nike® Free 3.0 Flyknit shoes thanks to the wrap-around Flywire technology and breathable Flyknit material. Women’s are 5.6 ounces. Men’s are 7.1 ounces.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Men's Nike Free 3.0 Flyknit in Black/Red

productList.productName: Stuart Weitzman 'Nouveau' Pump in Red Quasar
productList.productDescription: Every woman needs a good pair of red heels in her wardrobe. Meet the Nouveau pump from Stuart Weitzman. Unequivocally sexy, this powerful statement shoe is one of the season's must haves. Make a lasting impression and pair with your favorite little black dress, a sharp tailored suit or jeans and an ethereal blouse. Heel measures approximately 4 inches. Leather sole. Made in Spain.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Stuart Weitzman 'Nouveau' Pump in Red Quasar

productList.productName: Chan Luu™ Cashmere and Silk Scarf in Poppy Red
productList.productDescription: Lightweight and super soft, this luxurious Chan Luu scarf is made from 70% cashmere and 30% silk. With it’s cheerful color and twisted fringe, it’s sure to become a wardrobe stable! Measures 62 inches wide and 64 inches long.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Chan Luu Cashmere and Silk Scarf in Poppy Red

productList.productName: Tadashi Shoji Lace Sheath Dress in Peppermint
productList.productDescription: Instead of the little black dress, try red instead! Pleated mesh bands crisscross the waist of a jewel-toned lace sheath framed by eyelash scallops around the bateau neckline, sleeveless armholes and elongated hemline. 41” regular length (size 8); 38” petite length (size 8P). Hidden back-zip closure. Lined. 100% nylon with 100% polyester contrast.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Tadashi Shoji Lace Sheath Dress in Peppermint

productList.productName: Lucky Brand Major Moto Jacket in Red
productList.productDescription: Every woman needs a classic leather in her wardrobe. Show your support for women’s heart health every day with this Lucky Brand® leather moto jacket in red. It offers the perfect blend of uptown sophistication and edgy style. Cropped jacket is fabricated from soft and supple lambskin leather.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Lucky Brand Major Moto Jacket in Red

productList.productName: Blue Nile Ruby and Diamond Drop Earrings in 14k White Gold
productList.productDescription: Elegance defined, these gemstone and diamond earrings feature round rubies framed by brilliant diamonds in 14k white gold settings. Featuring 8 center round rubies and 78 round side diamonds totaling .33 carats.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Blue Nile Ruby and Diamond Drop Earrings in 14k White Gold

productList.productName: Frye Jackie Zip Tall Boot in Burnt Red
productList.productDescription: Handcrafted tailored leather riding style on a heel with full back zip and snaps for style and function.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Frye Jackie Zip Tall Boot in Burnt Red

productList.productName: Patagonia Men’s Down Shirt in Turkish Red
productList.productDescription: Minimalized to perfection, this Down Shirt from Patagonia exemplifies their less-is-more philosophy—100% recycled polyester shell and liner, 600-fill-power 100% Traceable Down (down that can be traced back to birds that were never force-fed, never live-plucked), and essential pockets. That’s it.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Patagonia Men’s Down Shirt in Turkish Red

productList.productDescription: A gigantic, statement-making watch boasts four time zones and both digital and analog time for an ultra-modern look. A sporty silicone-wrapped bezel and matching strap temper the industrial design. 58mm case; 27mm band width. Deployant clasp closure. Date window. Quartz movement. Mineral crystal face. Stainless steel or gunmetal ionic plate/silicone.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter DIESEL® 'Mr. Daddy' Time Zone Watch, 58mm
